Issue.creator: avkrishnan
Issue.summary: Get requests on Indy return empty data if the data was not found, it must return an error
Issue.description: The dev after fixing this should write a test that queries sovrin for # an unadded NYM and the response should contain an error code.# an unadded attribute and the response should contain an error code.# an added SCHEMA and the response should contain an error code.# an added ISSUER_KEY and the response should contain an error code.
